description: Trap to be send for MAPS threshold events.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD BROCADE-MAPS-MIB::mapsTrapAM BROCADE-MAPS-MIB::mapsConfigRuleName s EXAMPLEEXAMPLEEXAMPLEEXAMPLEEXAMPLEEXAMPLEEXAMPLEEXAMPLEEXAMPLEE BROCADE-MAPS-MIB::mapsConfigObjectGroupType i 1 BROCADE-MAPS-MIB::mapsConfigObjectKeyType i 1 BROCADE-MAPS-MIB::mapsConfigObjectKeyValue s EXAMPLEEXAMPLEEXAMPLEEXAMPLEEXAMPLEEXAMPLEEXAMPLEEXAMPLEEXAMPLEE BROCADE-MAPS-MIB::mapsConfigNumOfMS i 9999 BROCADE-MAPS-MIB::mapsConfigMsList s EXAMPLEEXAMPLEEXAMPLEEXAMPLEEXAMPLEEXAMPLEEXAMPLEEXAMPLEEXAMPLEEXAMPLEEXAMPLEEXAMPLEEXAMPLEEXAMPLEEXAMPLEEXAMPLEEXAMPLEEXAMPLEEX BROCADE-MAPS-MIB::mapsConfigSeverityLevel i 1 BROCADE-MAPS-MIB::mapsConfigCondition s EXAMPLEEXAMPLEEXAMPLEEXAMPLEEXAMPLEEXAMPLEEXAMPLEEXAMPLEEXAMPLEE BROCADE-MAPS-MIB::mapsConfigAction i 9999 BROCADE-SYSTEM-MIB::swVfId i 0 BROCADE-MAPS-MIB::mapsDbCategory s EXAMPLEEXAMPLEEXAMPLEEXA

description: It indicates the rule name which associates a condition
with actions that need to be triggered
when the specified condition is evaluated to true.
variables.name: BROCADE-MAPS-MIB::mapsConfigRuleName

description: It indicates the object group type like circuit, PS, FAN.
variables.name: BROCADE-MAPS-MIB::mapsConfigObjectGroupType

description: It indicates the object key type. The main purpose of this
object to help NMS applications to interpret the data easily.
Eg: If the mapsConfigObjectGroupType is port then the key type
is an integer and key value is the port number.
variables.name: BROCADE-MAPS-MIB::mapsConfigObjectKeyType

description: It indicates the object key value. Incase of integer this field
keeps as 1, 2, 3, 4, etc., and for string it keeps
flowname1, flowname2, etc., Eg: if Group type is port
then the object key value is the port number.
variables.name: BROCADE-MAPS-MIB::mapsConfigObjectKeyValue

description: It indicates the number of monitoring system entries
in the notifications
variables.name: BROCADE-MAPS-MIB::mapsConfigNumOfMS

description: It indicates the list of the monitoring systems. The
format is <msname>,<value-type>,<current-value>,<time-base>
::<msName>,<value-type>,<current-value>,<time-base>::.
variables.name: BROCADE-MAPS-MIB::mapsConfigMsList

description: It indicates the severity level of the
condition triggered
variables.name: BROCADE-MAPS-MIB::mapsConfigSeverityLevel

description: It indicates the condition defined in the rule.
It includes the counter, time base and threshold
value with the logical operation (eg: >, <, >= etc) that
needs to be evaluated. Eg: (CRC/MIN > 10)
variables.name: BROCADE-MAPS-MIB::mapsConfigCondition

description: It indicates the actions(bitmask value) that need
to be triggered when the specified condition
evaluated to be true. Action bitmask value mapping are
none (0)
raslog (1)
snmp (2)
port-fence (8)
email (16)
switchstatus-down (64)
switchstatus-marginal (128)
switchstatus-healthy (256)
switchpolicy (512)
sfp-marginal (1024)
Ex: mapsConfigAction value 3 represents both raslog and snmp action
variables.name: BROCADE-MAPS-MIB::mapsConfigAction

description: The Virtual fabric id.
variables.name: BROCADE-SYSTEM-MIB::swVfId

description: indicates db category name
variables.name: BROCADE-MAPS-MIB::mapsDbCategory
